author: Peerzada Ashiq
text:
National Conference (NC) working president and former chief minister Omar Abdullah on Tuesday said the Peoples Democratic Party’s (PDP) cards stand exposed following PDP MP Muzaffar Hussain Baig’s remarks that party chief Mehbooba Mufti sought no confidence-building measures from the BJP on government formation.

“But isn’t this what Mehbooba said after meeting Gov Vohra so why the change of stand now? This is confusing. Now they DON’T want CBMs #strange,” wrote Mr. Abdullah on Twitter. Mr. Baig reportedly claimed that Ms. Mufti wanted a timeline for implementation of the ‘Agenda of Alliance’ from ally BJP, but no CBMs.
title: PDP stand confusing: NC
